<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_hub_flow"> <sys_hub_flow action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <access>public</access> <acls/> <active>false</active> <annotation/> <callable_by_client_api>false</callable_by_client_api> <category/> <copied_from/> <copied_from_name/> <description><p>This subflow will first upload a file on RWS TMS and then create a new project on RWS TMS.</p> <p> <b>Inputs:</b> </p> <ul> <li> <strong>LFTASK Number</strong> - Associated Localization Framework TASK number. </li> <li> <strong>XLIFF1.2 Content</strong> - XLIFF Content (version 1.2) that needs to be translated. </li> <li> <strong>Source Language</strong> - Source language code of the file. Ex: en </li> <li> <strong>Target Language</strong> - Language code to which the file needs to be translated. Ex: fr </li> </ul> <p> <b>Outputs:</b> </p> <li> <strong>Project Info</strong> - An object contains project_id once a project is successfully created on RWS TMS. </li> <li> <strong>Status</strong> - 'Success' if the request succeeds or 'Error' if a failure occurs. </li> <li> <strong>Error Message</strong> - Reason for error. Populated only when an error occurs. </li> <li> <strong>Error Code</strong> - Code for error. Populated only when an error occurs. </li> </ul> <p><b>Error Codes - Error Messages:</b></p> <ul> <li>40500 - Authentication failed.</li> <li>40510 -Error while requesting the translations.</li> </ul> <p>To use this subflow, the corresponding RWS TMS Connection & Credential alias must be configured. <a target="_blank" href="/api/now/v1/context_doc_url/SDL_Translation_Management_System_Spoke">Learn <callable_by_client_api>false</callable_by_client_api> <category/> <copied_from/> <copied_from_name/> <description><p>This subflow will first upload a file on RWS TMS and then create a new project on RWS TMS.</p> <p> <b>Inputs:</b> </p> <ul> <li> <strong>LFTASK Number</strong> - Associated Localization Framework TASK number. </li> <li> <strong>XLIFF1.2 Content</strong> - XLIFF Content (version 1.2) that needs to be translated. </li> <li> <strong>Source Language</strong> - Source language code of the file. Ex: en </li> <li> <strong>Target Language</strong> - Language code to which the file needs to be translated. Ex: fr </li> </ul> <p> <b>Outputs:</b> </p> <li> <strong>Project Info</strong> - An object contains project_id once a project is successfully created on RWS TMS. </li> <li> <strong>Status</strong> - 'Success' if the request succeeds or 'Error' if a failure occurs. </li> <li> <strong>Error Message</strong> - Reason for error. Populated only when an error occurs. </li> <li> <strong>Error Code</strong> - Code for error. Populated only when an error occurs. </li> </ul> <p><b>Error Codes - Error Messages:</b></p> <ul> <li>40500 - Authentication failed.</li> <li>40510 -Error while requesting the translations.</li> </ul> <p>To use this subflow, the corresponding RWS TMS Connection & Credential alias must be configured. <a target="_blank" href="/api/now/v1/context_doc_url/SDL_Translation_Management_System_Spoke">Learn
